name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！ #天音かなた生誕祭 「堕天使の憂鬱」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Melancholy of the Fallen Angel＂【ホロライブ】 [UdbB5g1ncHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Amane Kanata addresses the audience about the 'world ending' scenario and announces the start of guest performances.
Guest performance section featuring Amane Kanata and Hakui Koyori.
Guest performance section featuring Amane Kanata and Ayunda Risu.

subtitles.original: はい、皆さん。どうですか、楽しんでいただいておりますか？
subtitles.english: Yes, everyone. Are you enjoying yourselves so far?

subtitles.original: 世界が滅びていってるわ。
subtitles.english: The world is perishing.

subtitles.original: 滅びてますね、どんどん。困っちゃいますね。
subtitles.english: It's perishing more and more. It's quite a problem, isn't it?

subtitles.original: さあ、宿敵に勝つために、彼女はなんと仲間を連れてくるそうです。
subtitles.english: Now, in order to defeat her nemesis, she's apparently bringing some friends along.

subtitles.original: ということでこれからはゲストパートが始まっていくよ！
subtitles.english: So, the guest part is about to begin!

subtitles.original: それじゃあみんな、いってらっしゃい！
subtitles.english: Well then everyone, off you go!

subtitles.original: 飛べ　起こせ　願うは自己
subtitles.english: Fly, stir things up, what I wish for is my own ego

subtitles.original: うん、一生一度さ　惑いと筋
subtitles.english: Yeah, once-in-a-lifetime chance, confusion and reason

subtitles.original: 掴み負けるか　ドラマなんてないわ
subtitles.english: Will I grasp or lose it? There's no drama

subtitles.original: あぁ永遠　幕を開けるわ
subtitles.english: Ah, forever opening the curtain

subtitles.original: 合致してラッキー　マネーどっちも無理　シガシガ
subtitles.english: Winning big, lucky money, both are impossible, ego ego

subtitles.original: 光るか否か　自分次第　イダイダ
subtitles.english: Whether I shine or not is up to me, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 余裕で振り切り　ザ・ウェアトゼイ　ヤヤヤヨ
subtitles.english: Easily shaking it off, we're at the top, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 束縛　そこへ　重なるの　私だ
subtitles.english: Being bound there, I'm the one who will win

subtitles.original: Say my Kanataなら平常心
subtitles.english: Say my name, Kanata, keeping my composure

subtitles.original: My bad boy かい　don't get in my way
subtitles.english: My bad boy, don't get in my way

subtitles.original: CH4NGEだ　待って
subtitles.english: Waiting for the CH4NGE

subtitles.original: One two three, One two three
subtitles.english: One two three, One two three

subtitles.original: One two three, See that, See that
subtitles.english: One two three, See that, See that

subtitles.original: 反目フリーズ　決めつけ投げ捨て　ノーはさ最後さ
subtitles.english: Envy, free yourself, throw away the hesitation, it's the end

subtitles.original: 剥ぎ裂く自己　その知性　四十八計られ得ないですよ　小生グッバイ
subtitles.english: Tearing down the ego, that intellect, can't be measured by the 48 tactics, I'm saying goodbye

subtitles.original: あっちこっちそっち　あーこっちなっち　ヤムヤム
subtitles.english: This way, that way, that way, this way, becoming... yum yum

subtitles.original: 満ちないこっち　満ち　ヤムヤムヤム
subtitles.english: Incomplete here, full of it, yum yum yum

subtitles.original: 絡まりそう　でもまだ　止めないで
subtitles.english: Entangled, but don't stop yet

subtitles.original: アノマレそう　声々　それそれに
subtitles.english: Anomaly, voice, voice, to each of them

subtitles.original: Get out my way, ah ya
subtitles.english: Get out my way, ah ya

subtitles.original: あんたここまで　後ろだけ見とけ
subtitles.english: You, just look back up to this point

subtitles.original: 合致してラッキー　マネーどっちも無理　シガシガ
subtitles.english: Winning big, lucky money, both are impossible, ego ego

subtitles.original: 光るか否か　自分次第　イダイダ
subtitles.english: Whether I shine or not is up to me, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 余裕で振り切り　ザ・ウェアトゼイ　ヤヤヤヨ
subtitles.english: Easily shaking it off, we're at the top, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 束縛　そこへ　重なるの　私だ
subtitles.english: Being bound there, I'm the one who will win

subtitles.original: Say my Kanataなら平常心
subtitles.english: Say my name, Kanata, keeping my composure

subtitles.original: My bad boy かい　don't get in my way
subtitles.english: My bad boy, don't get in my way

subtitles.original: CH4NGEだ　待って
subtitles.english: Waiting for the CH4NGE

subtitles.original: One two three... see that, see that...
subtitles.english: One two three... see that, see that...

subtitles.original: One two three... see that, see that...
subtitles.english: One two three... see that, see that...

subtitles.original: 短い夢を重ねて　永遠にしてゆく花の
subtitles.english: Layering short dreams, turning them into an eternal flower

subtitles.original: 偽りが切なく　閉じ込めた命の
subtitles.english: The lies are painful, the life that was locked away

subtitles.original: 孤独を君に捧げる　Preserved Roses
subtitles.english: I dedicate this loneliness to you, Preserved Roses

subtitles.original: 身体の奥溢れるものを　ひとこと
subtitles.english: A single word for what overflows deep within the body

subtitles.original: 渇いているだけ　全てが冷たく告げるなんて
subtitles.english: Just being dry, everything telling me coldly

subtitles.original: 指も任せないで
subtitles.english: Don't even let your fingers touch it

subtitles.original: 光と闇の　どちらにでも居れる
subtitles.english: I can be in either light or darkness

subtitles.original: 怖がらないで　望まぬ朝はもう来ない
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid, the morning you don't want will no longer come

subtitles.original: 鮮やかなだけを繰り返し　繋がり終わり　君はまた
subtitles.english: Just repeating the vividness, the connection ends, and you are again

subtitles.original: 短い夢を重ねて　永遠にしてゆく花の
subtitles.english: Layering short dreams, turning them into an eternal flower

subtitles.original: 偽りが切なく　拒む世界を傷つける
subtitles.english: The lies are painful, hurting the world that rejects them

subtitles.original: 願うなら見せさせる　だから遠くで消えないで
subtitles.english: If you wish, I'll let you see, so don't disappear in the distance

subtitles.original: 君が見る明日の　新しい息吹きを
subtitles.english: The new breath of the tomorrow you see

subtitles.original: 溢した腕に迎える　離さないで
subtitles.english: Welcoming it into my spilled arms, don't let go

subtitles.original: 無傷のまま解き出す熱を　愛を　まさぐる想い
subtitles.english: Searching for love and the heat that starts to melt while remaining unscarred

subtitles.original: 作り物の微笑み　疑いに囚われながら
subtitles.english: While being trapped by doubt and a fabricated smile
